title: Spiced roasted peach and beetroot salad

ingredients.item: 3 large ripe peaches, halved and stoned
½ tsp Ras el Hanout spice
180g pack Sweetfire beetroot, cut into wedges
1 pack Summer Salad with Sorrel & Quinoa, or 250g pack Waitrose Quinoa, Chickpeas, Bulgar Wheat & Rice

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ºC, gas mark 6. Place the peach halves in a single layer in a roasting tin. Mix together the spice, yogurt and mint and spoon half this mixture into the hollows. Bake for 15–20 minutes until tender. Cut the peaches into wedges.
Toss the beetroot with the remaining yogurt and mint dressing. Arrange the warm peaches and beetroot with the salad or quinoa mix in a shallow salad bowl. Scatter with the salad onions and serve.
